name: Haakjir
movement: walk 40 ft., burrow 15 ft., climb 30 ft.
description: The Haakjir is a medium-sized monstrosity with lethal claws and unique earth manipulation abilities, enabling it to traverse rocky terrains effortlessly.
memorable: Its Claw attacks can bypass the armor of metal-wielding foes, making it a dangerous opponent in combat.
goals: Engages in tactical combat, often alongside allies, to outmaneuver and overpower its enemies.
relations: May be found in the company of other earth-based creatures or allies that complement its tactical abilities.
environment: Typically found in rocky or uneven terrains, where it can utilize its burrowing and climbing skills.
strengths: High Strength and Dexterity allow for effective melee damage and agility in combat scenarios, along with its Pack Tactics for enhanced attack opportunities.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma hinder its problem-solving abilities and social interactions.
attacks: Multiattack includes one Bite dealing 10 piercing damage and two Claws each dealing 8 slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Earthen Claws allow it to ignore the armor bonuses of metal armors, making it particularly deadly against certain foes.
senses: Possesses tremorsense, allowing it to detect vibrations within 30 feet.
additional_information: Can climb upside down on ceilings with Earth Climb ability.
Stealthy approach is enhanced by Earth Glide, enabling it to burrow without being detected.
Gains advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in rocky environments due to Stone Camouflage.
test_queries: monster with lethal claws and earth manipulation
agile creature that can burrow and climb
tactical monster skilled in rocky environments
medium monstrosity able to bypass armor
neutral creature with climbing and burrowing abilities
